com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn
Class Actions

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn.Actions
Direct Known Subclasses:
LayoutActions, SelectionToolBarActions, TreeTocPopupActions, ZoomPanToolBarActions
public class Actions
extends Object

This class defines a collection of Action objects. It provides simple access methods for adding, removing, and finding Actions based upon an unique (String) id.

Subclasses should define appropriate ids and functionality behind those ids for a particular group of Actions, for example com.esri.mo2.ui.mn.Actions defines the Actions necessary for MapNotes.

NOTE: The underlying collection used by Actions consists of a java.util.ArrayList and a HashMap.

All operations such as addAction() and deleteAction() are un-synchronized. It is the responsibility of the calling code to synchronize use of these methods where necessary.

Constructor Detail

Actions

public Actions()
Method Detail

addAction

public void addAction(Action action,
                      String id)
Adds an action object to the pool of MapNotes actions.

The Action needs to have an unique id. If the id is already being used then the existing Action will be replaced.

Parameters:
action - the Action to be added
id - an unique action identifier
See Also:
addAction(com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn.Action, java.lang.String)

addAction

public void addAction(String id,
                      Action action)
This method is the same as addAction(Action action, String id) with arguments reversed.

See Also:
addAction(com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn.Action, java.lang.String)

deleteAction

public Action deleteAction(String actionId)
Deletes the Action corresponding to actionId from the available collection of action objects. Returns the deleted action if it exists, otherwise null is returned.

Parameters:
actionId - the action identifier
Returns:
the deleted action object

actionExists

public boolean actionExists(String actionId)
This method determines if the Action associated with actionId exists within this collection of Actions.

Returns:
true if the Action specified by the actionId exists

getAction

public Action getAction(String actionId)
Returns the Action associated with the specified actionId. If the object does not exist within this collection, then null is returned.

Parameters:
actionId - an unique action identifier
See Also:
getAction(java.lang.String)

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(String actionId)
Performs an Action specified by actionId. This method does nothing if the Action does not exist within this collection of Actions.

setActionEnabled

public void setActionEnabled(String actionId,
                             boolean value)
This method enables/disables an Action associated with the specified actionId. If disabled, the corresponding toolbar button or menubar item is greyed out and will not be clickable.

Parameters:
actionId - an unique Action identifier

isActionEnabled

public boolean isActionEnabled(String actionId)
This method determines if the specified Action is enabled/disabled. Returns false if the action does not exist.

setAllEnabled

public void setAllEnabled(boolean value)
This method enables/disables all Actions within this collection.

getAction

public Action getAction(int actionIndex)
Returns the Action using the specified index.

Parameters:
actionIndex - index where the Action object will be returned

getActionIndex

public int getActionIndex(String actionId)
Returns the index of an Action associated with the specified actionId. If no Action matches the specified id, an integer value of -1 is returned. It is the responsibility of the user/developer to check the returned index value.

Parameters:
actionId - an unique Action identifier
Returns:
an index of the specified Action

size

public int size()
Returns the total number of Actions available within this collection.

updateIcons

public void updateIcons()
Update icons of all the actions within this collection of Action objects.
